Inspired by an 18th century original by Thomas Sheraton.

image:image.image:caption: Our Black Ofram veneered Eamon Bookcase has four independent doors in our Natural Ebonized Ofram finish that reveal two enclosed drawers with three glass and veneered top shelves highlighted with LED interior lights. Designed with a Sycamore veneer interior and finished on Theodore Alexander’s hand-crafted bracket feet.
image:image.image:title: Eamon Bookcase

image:image.image:caption: A vibrant splash of color, the Sea Glass Hall Chest is captured in our Bleached Driftwood finish with beautifully hand-crafted sandblasted fluted glass doors in the bright Sea Foam finish. Accented with a modern hammered aluminum handle to reveal an enclosed drawer with adjustable shelving. Centered on angled tapering aluminum legs.
image:image.image:title: Sea Glass Hall Chest

image:image.image:caption: A sophisticated space for one’s essential spirits, this dignified artisan-carved bar cabinet displays a Morado veneer inlay, fluted top and door apron detail, marble countertop and adjustable top glass shelves. Inspired by a door panel in the Althorp House that was molded after Roman columns, this cabinet is available with a hidden fluted frieze drawer, an adjustable bottom shelf, and brass cappings on the legs. Seen here in our Classic English finish with handmade brass ornaments and hinges.
image:image.image:title: Conrad Bar Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: A sophisticated space for one’s essential spirits, this dignified artisan-carved bar cabinet displays a Morado veneer inlay, fluted top and door apron detail, marble countertop and adjustable top glass shelves. Inspired by a door panel in the Althorp House that was molded after Roman columns, this cabinet is available with a hidden fluted frieze drawer, an adjustable bottom shelf, and brass cappings on the legs. Classic English finish with gold details and handmade brass ornaments and hinges.
image:image.image:title: Conrad Bar Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: With hand carved legs inspired by one of Althorp’s original fire guards, the Marlborough Cocktail table is crafted from Khaya mahogany that radiates in any space. This table is designed with a fine wavy X cast brass scrolling on each side and an undulating hand-carved acanthus leaf scroll apron. Seen here in our Morris finish.
image:image.image:title: Marlborough Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Small but commanding, this end table has graceful serpentine edges with brass detailing including a banded frieze drawer with a fluted top post resting on intricate hand-carved spiral twist supports. You will find a Morado banded undertier underneath on fluted peg feet with fine brass cappings. Seen here in classic English finish.
image:image.image:title: Sunderland Small End Table

image:image.image:caption: This elegant Grey Limestone finish painted with Light Stockton fretwork gracefully complements our round pedestal center table with a molded apron. Four inswept solid beech legs joined at the ends with a carved collar.
image:image.image:title: Morning Room Center Table

image:image.image:caption: A renowned piece for any home, this turned occasional pedestal table with Zebrali veneer is sure to command attention. Seen here in Dibdin Crotch finish and complemented with an incredibly intricate brass inlaid apron and brass-wrapped posts supported by three alluring sabre legs with embellished brass cappings.
image:image.image:title: Ante Occasional Table

image:image.image:caption: Transitional meets modern with our geometric art deco inspired center table. Displayed with an edgy frameless glass top in our White Dove Lacquer finish.
image:image.image:title: Nadia Center Table

image:image.image:caption: Resting upon an 18th century bracket foot with fine Zebrali swirled veneers, this classic German-inspired Morado and sycamore chest is set to become a very distinguished part of our Althorp Living History Collection. This piece has been modernized with refined frieze molded drawers complimented by antique brass handles and fluted Morado posts sitting atop of a distinguished serpentine base.
image:image.image:title: Northampton Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: The visibly striking design of our Lola King Bed rests upon four oak tapered legs and can be seen in our Grey Echo Oak finish. Featuring a finely carved dental moulding along the top as well as a carved and relieved headboard and frame, this oak veneered panel bed is the perfect place to rest your head and unwind.
image:image.image:title: Lola Bed

image:image.image:caption: An elegantly carved Morado veneered console table with serpentine edge decorated with the finest brass detail. This console was designed with three banded frieze drawers joined with fluted top posts atop hand-carved spiral twist supports and X stretcher with brass cappings. Seen here in classic English finish with gold details.
image:image.image:title: Sunderland Gilt Console Table

image:image.image:caption: The Caledonia Console Table magnificently catches the eye with three frieze inspired drawers and apron finish with Sea Foam leather. This Eucalyptus Pommele veneered console table is featured in our Bleached Driftwood finish. A splayed base joined with a Eucalyptus Pommele veneer stretcher.
image:image.image:title: Caledonia Console Table

image:image.image:caption: A handsomely crafted piece with marquetry veneers accented with three frieze drawers and brass handle pulls in our Dark English finish to reflect a beautifully crafted masterpiece. Resting upon a turned leg, and captured in the Dibdin Crotch finish.
image:image.image:title: Ante Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: The stylish Sway Credenza seen in our White Dove Lacquer finish is crafted from Khaya veneer and includes adjustable shelves behind its three brilliantly hand-crafted faux horn painted front doors.
image:image.image:title: Sway Credenza

image:image.image:caption: Subtle, yet modern, this eucalyptus veneered side table includes a chamfered base with brass appointments in our Fumed Eucalyptus finish.
image:image.image:title: Heron Side Table

image:image.image:caption: An elegantly carved Morado veneered console table with serpentine edge decorated with the finest brass detail. This console was designed with three banded frieze drawers joined with fluted top posts atop hand-carved spiral twist supports and X stretcher with brass cappings. Seen here in classic English finish.
image:image.image:title: Sunderland Console Table

image:image.image:caption: An iconic piece from our Theodore Alexander Collection that is great for entertaining. This Khaya veneered piece in our Natural Mahogany finish is crafted with a pleasing zig zag base with brass appointments.
image:image.image:title: Barbarossa Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Seen in our Classic English finish, this beautifully veneered buffet has three frieze drawers supported by a connecting apron with artisan crafted brass handles. When opening the Morado veneered doors, you will find three adjustable shelves ideal for storing your family’s precious fine china. Brass cappings on the four spiral turned legs finish this grand piece.
image:image.image:title: Sunderland Buffet

image:image.image:caption: A beautifully crafted Zebrali veneered writing table designed with a smooth, tooled leather top. Featuring five Frieze inspired drawers with brass inlays and a marquetry apron. Complemented with Dark English brass hardware and brass inlaid tapered legs. The legs are finished with the finest brass cappings to provide an exquisite contrast to the base.
image:image.image:title: Ante Desk

image:image.image:caption: This rustic oak veneer dresser, seen in our Echoes Light finish with a modern tapered leg, adds an interesting and innovative element to any bedroom. Displayed with eight hand crafted pull-out frieze drawers that are accented by hammered aluminum handles.
image:image.image:title: Southton Dresser

image:image.image:caption: The Ante Center Table is crafted with Zebrali veneer in our Dibdin Crotch finish with brass inlays. It includes a brass inlaid apron and three hidden side drawers with brass detailing for added elegance and storage. Supported by three graceful sabre legs with solid brass cappings, this dignified table will bring attention to any room.
image:image.image:title: Ante Center Table

image:image.image:caption: This rustic oak veneer dresser, seen in our Grey Echo Oak finish with a modern tapered leg, adds an interesting and innovative element to any bedroom. Displayed with eight hand crafted pull-out frieze drawers that are accented by hammered aluminum handles.
image:image.image:title: Southton Dresser

image:image.image:caption: This stylish Khaya wooden nightstand in our handsome Dibdin Swirl finish blends accentuating veneers crafted from Zebrali swirl, primavera, makore, sycamore, and marquetry wooden inlays. Three frieze inspired drawers of Zebrali veneer are featured with Dark English finished brass handles. Appears on a classic Tapered Leg.
image:image.image:title: Boddington Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: A dignified take on a traditional classic, this handmade cocktail table is designed with captivating serpentine edges decorated using only the finest brass details. A banded frieze drawer is joined with an elegantly fluted top post atop spiraled hand-twisted supports. Underneath you will find a Morado banded and glass undertier, all sitting on distinguishably fluted peg feet with brass cappings. Seen here in classic English finish with gold details.
image:image.image:title: Sunderland Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Royally inspired, and delicately crafted from Khaya mahogany, the Marlborough Gallery Console Table is crafted with a noble serpentine edge in our Morris finish with gold details. The top displays a grand wavy X cast with brass scrolling on each side. Hand-carved acanthus leaf scroll apron sits atop slender acantus chippendale legs inspired by one of Althorp’s original fire guards.
image:image.image:title: Marlborough Gallery Console Table

image:image.image:caption: This grand double-doored showcase cabinet is made with Khaya veneer and a rich Morado inlay with fluted top apron. Seen here in our Classic English finish with two elegant glass doors on top with beautiful handmade brass ornaments. LED lighting is installed on the interior with adjustable glass shelves while the lower half consists of a hidden fluted frieze drawer and beautiful brass cappings on the feet.
image:image.image:title: Conrad Display Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: The circular extending Great Brington Jupe Dining Table is intricately crafted with crossbanded Khaya mahogany and Morado veneers on top to form six triangular segments that function as self-storing inset leaves. This noble table sits on a boldly turned spiral fluted pillar atop a formally carved base with concave sides, out swept legs and finely cast brass cappings on the feet. Seen here in classic English finish with details.
image:image.image:title: Great Brington Gilt Jupe Table

image:image.image:caption: The perfect addition to any room, this hand-carved convertible game table is designed with a Zebrali swirl veneered top and distinguished leather inlay. The serpentine molded edges handsomely complement the hidden frieze drawer atop finely carved acanthus leaf cabriole legs. Seen here in Dibdin Swirl finish.
image:image.image:title: Boddington Game Table

image:image.image:caption: Our Grey Limestone finished console table with Light Stockton fretwork is gorgeously accented with a molded carving apron and two hidden drawers on each side. Seen upon six tapered legs with detailed carved molding, the Morning Room Console Table is joined together with two under tier stretchers all resting on solid block feet. This table adds the perfect finishing touch to any room.
image:image.image:title: Morning Room Console Table

image:image.image:caption: The Bolen cocktail ottoman is a wonderful cultural mix with Anglo-Indian antecedents – and a go-to for today’s home. image:image.image:title: Thought Writing Table

image:image.image:caption: An ebonised and parcel gilt open armchair, the overscrolled back centred by a painted rectangular panel, with a caned and cushion seat, the cushions in blue silk hand-embroidered with coronets, on a Greek key seat rail and on ring turned tapering . The original Regency, circa 1820.
image:image.image:title: Lavinia's Armchair

image:image.image:caption: Boldly drawn breakfront-top sideboard beautifully serves form and function. Two central drawers and two relief-panel door compartments form the primary body of the sideboard buffet. Three baguette relief drawers with pullout trays offer extra storage space. Set on raised turned and tapered legs.
image:image.image:title: Oscar Sideboard

image:image.image:caption: A fine Treviso finish walnut burl Bed with ebonized banding, the shaped and button tufted upholstered headboard flanked by turned and reeded columns with pinecone finials, above paneled rails and tapering turned and reeded legs.
image:image.image:title: Sebastian US King Bed

image:image.image:caption: Très chic. This writing table is a twist on a French classic. Desktop boasts a gilt-tooled leather inset and frieze slides. Flowerhead fretwork wraps around the apron, outfitted with three drawers. The desk stands on turned and fluted tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Mirabella Writing Table

image:image.image:caption: There’s a not-so-quiet dignity to the McCombs Dresser with three fretwork relief frieze drawers, and six generously sized paneled drawers with Hampton finish brass handles below. A chamfered-edge dresser top and turned tapered legs balance details from top to bottom.
image:image.image:title: McCombs Dresser

image:image.image:caption: Sebastiano combines a historic silhouette with an edgy modern sensibility. Rectangular dining table is curved with an apron bound in brass. Set on slatted baluster legs outlined in gilt. Company coming? It’s an extendable dining room table with three leaves.
image:image.image:title: Sebastiano Extending Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: Alexa Hampton’s clean and sleek reinvention of a classic coffee table, Baron holds court beautifully. Rectangular cocktail table top is bound in brass with a simple frieze. Set on octagonal legs clad in acanthus cast feet. Beech and mahogany veneers.
image:image.image:title: Baron Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: A deep button upholstered Chesterfield Sofa, the overscrolled back and arms on tapering and spiral carved legs. The original Regency, circa 1840.
image:image.image:title: The Althorp Library Sofa

image:image.image:caption: A hand carved mahogany scoop back dining chair, the panelled and upholstered back above an upholstered seat, on turned and reeded legs.
image:image.image:title: Floris Sidechairs

image:image.image:caption: Andrew puts a modern spin on the traditional buffet cabinet. There’s storage aplenty with four frieze drawers, two center doors opening to interior shelves, plus open storage on buffet sides. Doric pilasters flow into turned, tapered legs capped in brass.
image:image.image:title: Andrew Buffet

image:image.image:caption: Jackson shines among dining room chairs: Brass roundels, molding capital legs and cast brass scroll feet add a twinkle of metal. Neoclassical style with padded over-scrolled back and box upholstered seat. This dining side chair has all the comfort an upholstered chair.
image:image.image:title: Jackson Side Chair

image:image.image:caption: A hand carved mahogany library armchair, the back in the shape of a ship's transom carved with a Coat of Arms centred by the Spencer crest flanked by Victory wreaths.
image:image.image:title: Ad Victoriam Accent Chair

image:image.image:caption: Based on a Biedermeier original, the two-door cabinet is detailed with a single frieze drawer, column capitals, ivory-finish escutcheons and set on raised block feet. William may also be used as a bar cabinet with a spacious interior and adjustable shelf.
image:image.image:title: William Bar Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: A hand carved mahogany scoop back dining armchair, the panelled and upholstered back above an upholstered seat flanked by scroll arms, on turned and reeded legs.
image:image.image:title: Floris Armchair

image:image.image:caption: Historically inspired, yet updated, the Cecil chest of drawers is perfect for the bedroom and beyond. Three frieze drawers sit atop three more long drawers with bold brass handles. Flanked by spiral turned columns and set on block feet.
image:image.image:title: Cecil Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: A mahogany and gilt framed and upholstered three seater sofa, the serpentine trailing husk carved toprail centred by a floral carved crest, with padded arms and finely carved scroll uprights, enclosing a cushion seat above a shaped, floral carved and fluted frieze on eight carved cabriole legs terminating scroll feet.
image:image.image:title: The Spencer House Sofa

image:image.image:caption: An earlier prototype of this unusual cocktail table, inspired by Greco-Roman grave stelae, can be found in Alexa Hampton’s own apartment. The waterfall tabletop is trimmed in Brass, descending to end supports with pierced and gilt Moorish windows. Stepped plinth bases. Textured ribbon Mahogany.
image:image.image:title: Amalia Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by a Danish antique, the four-tier Hunt étagère is rife with broader global influences. Like the molded pagoda cornice. Or the spiral column supports detailed with Classic carved capitals and set on lobed tapering legs. Four open shelves offer a world of storage and display space.
image:image.image:title: Hunt Étagère

image:image.image:caption: There’s a not-so-quiet dignity to the McCombs Dresser with three fretwork relief frieze drawers, and six generously sized paneled drawers with Hampton finish brass handles below. A chamfered-edge dresser top and turned tapered legs balance details from top to bottom.
image:image.image:title: McCombs Dresser

image:image.image:caption: A hand carved mahogany scoop back dining armchair, the panelled and upholstered back above an upholstered seat flanked by scroll arms, on turned and reeded legs.

image:image.image:caption: Jackson shines among dining room chairs: Brass roundels, molding capital legs and cast brass scroll feet add a twinkle of metal. Neoclassical style with padded over-scrolled back and box upholstered seat. This dining arm chair has all the comfort an upholstered chair.

image:image.image:caption: A sophisticated Neoclassical design with Biedermeier flavor, Garth has strict pilaster legs with brass trimmings. A veneered top and apron with pull drawer sit atop a tall open space meant to accommodate accessories on a veneered lower base.
image:image.image:title: Garth Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: A dual pedestal console with Baltic flair, the Pearce has clean lines and hidden storage.
image:image.image:title: Pearce Console Table

image:image.image:caption: A sophisticated Neoclassical design with Biedermeier flavor, Garth has strict pilaster legs with brass trimmings. A veneered top and apron with pull drawer sit atop a tall open space meant to accommodate accessories on a veneered lower base.
image:image.image:title: Garth Console Table

image:image.image:caption: Evocative of Jacobean craftsmanship, Kerry boasts a shaped apron with three pull drawers, carved columnar legs and lower shelf.
image:image.image:title: Kerry Console Table

image:image.image:caption: A sexy cabinet reminiscent of the roaring 1920’s, the Mannix is decked out with eglomise glass and gilt painted lines. Two substantial drawers with brass toggle pulls provide desirable storage.
image:image.image:title: Mannix Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: Based on an Empire Italian antique, Melinda features inset ebonized floral decorations, gray marble top and lower wood shelf with brass galleries, carved griffin head legs and paw feet.
image:image.image:title: Melinda Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: A musical quartet of shaped and carved legs support this extendable dining table top. With brass sabots and legs for days, Olivia is sure to turn heads.
image:image.image:title: Olivia Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: This Russian Neoclassical stunner features inlay brass details on the apron and drawer faces in a classic modernized diamond pattern that stays true to historical influences. A leather inset top compliments the fluted legs and brass cappings bringing balance from top to bottom.
image:image.image:title: Eugenia Desk

image:image.image:caption: An interpretation of a French Empire antique, Sutton features a gray marble stone top, faceted pedestal base on three carved legs with scroll accents.

image:image.image:caption: Designed for a longtime client, the Linda has a scroll design top with saber legs and brass cappings. A lower shelf accommodates objets and coffee table books.

image:image.image:caption: The Francesca is sure to turn heads with her turned wood base and eglomise painted glass top. Shown in Cambridge finish.

image:image.image:caption: A mix of personalities, Duane combines chic French Directoire fluted legs with gilt petal details. Recessed Greek key brass drawer pulls embellish modest wood drawer faces. Shown with gray marble stone top.

image:image.image:caption: A tempietto bookcase table built for Alexa’s own apartment, this gem features all of the classic elements: fluted Doric columns, a frieze with triglyphs and metopes, with guttae and recessed side panels.

image:image.image:caption: The Charlie Bench is a storage enthusiast’s dream. Perfect for the foot of the bed or as a coffee table ottoman, Charlie has secret storage beneath his tufted top. A modified raised Greek key design around the base adds refinement.
image:image.image:title: Charlie Bench

image:image.image:caption: With a well-contoured form and button tufting, the Ava bed brings drama and comfort to the head of the bed. Shown with an upholstered show wood base finished in Cambridge.
image:image.image:title: Ava Bed

image:image.image:caption: This Swedish Neoclassical inspired armchair features a sleigh form back rail, open cantilever arms, and brass cappings. Upholstered seat, back and inner arms lend comfort to this accent chair.
image:image.image:title: Fraiser Dining Chair

image:image.image:caption: An updated take on a classic Maison Jansen silhouette. A tight upholstered back with loose seats gives this chair the perfect combination of sophistication and approachability. A slim tapered leg and flared arm amend the historical model.
image:image.image:title: Neill Club Chair

image:image.image:caption: An English arm sofa, the triple loose pillow back and loose cushion seat with four throw pillows and a kidney pillow, on turned legs.
image:image.image:title: Betanie Sofa II

image:image.image:caption: With a nod to Art Deco sensibilities, Rebecca is a feminine dining chair with softly curved wood and upholstered back on tapered and fluted leg with small nail head details at upper leg.
image:image.image:title: Rebecca Dining Arm Chair

image:image.image:caption: Reminiscent of a 1930’s style chair, Ulla has a soft curved back, rounded arms and base framed in wood. A skirt conceals a swivel mechanism making Ulla both beautiful and practical.
image:image.image:title: Ulla Accent Chair

image:image.image:caption: Hines is a classic upholstered bench with upholstered sides and seat in all over button tufting, long turned legs and brass casters.
image:image.image:title: Hines Bench

image:image.image:caption: A lavish chair with all over tufting, the Wingate Chair, is a classic silhouette with a masculine feel. Plush tight tufted seat and back, soft scrolled arms, and turned wood feet impart a handsome elegance for any room.
image:image.image:title: Wingate Club Chair

image:image.image:caption: Simple, yet stately. The Richards Bed boasts a carved wood frame with frame and inset channeled upholstery.
image:image.image:title: Richards Bed

image:image.image:caption: Based on a Neoclassical dining chair, the Sloane folds for accommodation. No detail has been spared on this small but mighty chair: 4 rows of recessed nail heads adorn the upholstered back, brass capital details, sabots and stretcher complete the design.
image:image.image:title: Sloane Folding Chair

image:image.image:caption: Reminiscent of an English chair model, the Virginia boasts comfort at every turn. Cushioned inner arms, loose seat cushions and upholstered back create a hybrid of tailoring and comfort. Set on tapered legs.
image:image.image:title: Virginia Club Chair

image:image.image:caption: With a nod to Art Deco sensibilities, Rebecca is a feminine dining chair with softly curved wood and upholstered back on tapered and fluted leg with small nail head details at upper leg.
image:image.image:title: Rebecca Dining Side Chair

image:image.image:caption: The Michelle Chaise Longue features a tufted seat and back finished with an scrolled upholstered back. These soft details are counterpoint to a handsome show wood base and shapely turned legs on brass castors.
image:image.image:title: Michelle Chaise

image:image.image:caption: An updated take on a classic Maison Jansen silhouette. A tight upholstered back with loose seats gives this sofa the perfect combination of sophistication and approachability. A slim tapered leg and flared arm amend the historical model.
image:image.image:title: Neill Sofa

image:image.image:caption: The Manning Chair is a striking take on a smoking chair with a curved upper rail, tufted back and curved seat. Long tapered legs, nail heads add subtle embellishment.
image:image.image:title: Manning Accent Chair

image:image.image:caption: Reminiscent of an English sofa model, the Virginia boasts comfort at every turn. Cushioned inner arms, loose seat cushions and upholstered back create a hybrid of tailoring and comfort. Set on tapered legs.
image:image.image:title: Virginia Love Seat

image:image.image:caption: Based on a Neoclassic bench, the Gregory features a reeded upper rail, fluted legs and rosette capitals. A turned wood stretcher meets a fluted x design. With a pull-up upholstered seat, the Gregory makes for great extra seating.
image:image.image:title: Gregory Bench

image:image.image:caption: A gorgeous adaptation of Biedermeier arm chair, Guy has sensuous sloping wood arms and lines trimmed in mahogany. A loose cushion provides a soft seat to this lounge chair.
image:image.image:title: Guy Accent Chair

image:image.image:caption: With Baltic influences, the Frances armchair features a scrolled arm, half round back with inset relief and carved sunburst detail.
image:image.image:title: Francis Dining Arm Chair

image:image.image:caption: Camille demonstrates a recapturing of French elegance and is modeled after a historical Louis XV carved slipper chair. Also a dining or accent chair, Camille is shown in Salted White finish on cabriole legs with natural brass nail heads.
image:image.image:title: Chamille Accent Chair

image:image.image:caption: With Baltic influences, the Frances side chair features half round back with inset relief and carved sunburst detail.
image:image.image:title: Francis Dining Side Chair

image:image.image:caption: Camille demonstrates a recapturing of French elegance and is modeled after a historical Louis XV carved slipper chair. Also a dining or accent chair, Camille is shown in Salted White finish on cabriole legs with natural brass nail heads.
image:image.image:title: Chamille Slipper Chair

image:image.image:caption: Reminiscent of an English sofa model, the Virginia boasts comfort at every turn. Cushioned inner arms, loose seat cushions and upholstered back create a hybrid of tailoring and comfort. Set on tapered legs.
image:image.image:title: Virginia Sofa

image:image.image:caption: A riff on a truly unique Egyptian Revival Chair, Newell features a lyrical back, upholstered seat, wood framed base with Greek key inlaid wood pattern and a gilded sunburst detail.
image:image.image:title: Newell Dining Chair

image:image.image:caption: A classic klismos form, the Lawrence chair features English Regency details with channel reeded frame on the upper back, recessed back rails with channel detail and recessed rosettes above slim slightly curved legs. An upholstered seat features an outer welt for comfort.
image:image.image:title: Lawrence Dining Side Chair

image:image.image:caption: A classic klismos form, the Lawrence chair features English Regency details with channel reeded frame on the upper back, recessed back rails with channel detail and recessed rosettes above slim slightly curved legs. An upholstered seat features an outer welt for comfort.
image:image.image:title: Lawrence Dining Arm Chair

image:image.image:caption: A lavish sofa with all over tufting, the Wingate Sofa, is a classic silhouette with a masculine feel. Plush tight tufted seat and back, soft scrolled arms, and turned wood feet impart a handsome elegance for any room.
image:image.image:title: Wingate Sofa

image:image.image:caption: An ebonised and parcel gilt occasional chair, the reeded, turned and bar top rail above a pierced trellis back, the upholstered drop in seat between downswept channelled arms, on splayed ring turned legs. Inspired by a Regency original.
image:image.image:title: Sophy's Chair

image:image.image:caption: A finely carved mahogany and gilt dining side chair, the padded back with a coronet carved crest and a carved frame, the reverse inlaid with okumé veneer and mother of pearl, the upholstered seat on turned and fluted legs.
image:image.image:title: The King's Side chair

image:image.image:caption: A unique upholstered armchair, the upholstered back with a guilloche carved arched top rail and sides above an acanthus baton arm with Lion carved terminals on bellflower and lapette cabriole uprights; the upholstered seat with a kidney pillow and with lion head terminals issuing from a winged lion carved sides with lion legs and paw and disc feet.
image:image.image:title: Painted Room Chair

image:image.image:caption: A fine mahogany occasional chair, the tall arched padded back with an armorial embroidery panel above an upholstered seat, flanked by leaf carved open scroll arms and on turned legs joined by a serpentine 'X' stretcher.
image:image.image:title: The Parlour Dining Chair

image:image.image:caption: A finely carved mahogany and gilt dining arm chair, the padded back with a coronet carved crest and a carved frame, the reverse inlaid with okumé veneer and mother of pearl, the upholstered seat on turned and fluted legs.
image:image.image:title: The King's Armchair

image:image.image:caption: An antiqued wood side chair, the arched toprail with chevron parquetry and centred by a star, with two arched ladders below between turned uprights, the upholstered seat on turned legs joined by stretchers. The original 17th century.
image:image.image:title: Chevron And Star Side chair

image:image.image:caption: A Byron finish mahogany 'Campaign' chair, the cantilever upholstered back with brass finials and above an upholstered seat flanked by 'X' supports and scroll terminal part padded arms, the legs joined by turned stretchers. Inspired by a 19th century English original.
image:image.image:title: Observatory Hill Accent Chair

image:image.image:caption: An antiqued wood side chair, the slatted back with an arched carved toprail, the upholstered seat on turned legs joined by stretchers. The original 17th century.
image:image.image:title: Country Seat Side chair

image:image.image:title: Chevron And Star Armchair

image:image.image:caption: MahoganyUpholstered
image:image.image:title: Drive Accent Chair

image:image.image:title: Arrondissement Bar Chair

image:image.image:caption: An antiqued wood Game chair, the arched back above projecting padded arms and an upholstered seat, on square tapering legs with spandrels joined by an 'X' stretcher and terminating in brass cappings and vinyl castors.

image:image.image:caption: The Vlad mirror is like a piece of abstract art – interesting and open to interpretation. Overall, the wall mirror is hexagon shaped. Strategically inserted geometric relief plates act as prisms, toying with shape and light. A sculptural and dimensioned mirror.
image:image.image:title: Vlad Hexagonal Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: Coco pays homage to Louis XVI and Jansen furniture. Revel in the gaming table detail: gilt-tooled leather top (chess or backgammon, anyone?), fluted frieze with cast brass flowerhead corner brackets and turned and fluted tapered legs with brass casters.
image:image.image:title: Coco Game Table

image:image.image:caption: Andrew puts a modern spin on the traditional buffet cabinet. There’s storage aplenty with four frieze drawers, two center doors opening to interior shelves, plus open storage on buffet sides. Doric pilasters flow into turned, tapered legs capped in brass.
image:image.image:title: Andrew Buffet

image:image.image:caption: Ian summons the bold geometries of Art Deco and a passion for architecture. Recessed frieze apron holds a rectangular molded-edge table top. The base is a three-part story: a trio of tapered columns stand tall on a stepped plinth base. And adaptable as a sofa table, too.
image:image.image:title: Ian Console Table

image:image.image:caption: Sebastiano combines a historic silhouette with an edgy modern sensibility. Rectangular dining table is curved with an apron bound in brass. Set on slatted baluster legs outlined in gilt. Company coming? It’s an extendable dining room table with three leaves.
image:image.image:title: Sebastiano Extending Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: Columnar and sculptural, the Hinton Center table is destined for center stage. Six turned legs with reeded baluster carvings rise from a six-point star plinth base set on molded feet. Completed with a round molded-edge tabletop. Mahogany solids and veneers.
image:image.image:title: Hinton Center Table

image:image.image:caption: A great decorative mirror can add instant architecture to a room. The Jaipur Wall Mirror evokes Moorish architecture with an exotic sculpted arch surrounding the mirror plate.
image:image.image:title: Jaipur Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: Transforming the unpredictable beauty of nature into an element of design, this console table makes a statement with high-impact design. Featuring a white, live edge inspired wood top and polished stainless prism bases.
image:image.image:title: Suzie Live Edge Console

image:image.image:caption: Transforming the unpredictable beauty of nature into an element of design, this dining table makes every meal memorable and unique. Featuring a white, live edge inspired wood top and polished stainless prism bases.
image:image.image:title: Suzanne Live Edge Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: Elegantly understated, the oak veneer case finished in Evening Finish is elevated on a Parsons style base. The doors feature the Negoro Nuri finish, based on a 12th century Japanese technique, involving layers of lacquer built up and sanded through, an artful reference to history. Delicate brass pulls pick up the golden hues of the tortoiseshell palette. This cabinet features brass handles and an interior with two sections, each with an adjustable shelf.
image:image.image:title: Kyoto Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by an amazing jewelry exhibit at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, a fascinating neck collar resulted in the Reed tables. This cabinet features four doors with brass handles and a triple section interior with adjustable shelves.

image:image.image:caption: I’ve always been fascinated by symbolism in nature. The dragonfly is a symbol of happiness, prosperity and harmony. If one flies into your home, it is a sign of good luck! These tables delightfully capture the magical flight of the dragonfly in mother of pearl framed in rich brass, inlaid into lustrous Pear lacquer. Let these beauties alight in your residence and capture good fortune.
image:image.image:title: Dragonfly Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by an amazing jewelry exhibit at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, a fascinating neck collar resulted in the Reed tables. This accent table features a circular Nero Maquina marble top and a vertically reeded cylinder body with Aulos Gilt Finish
image:image.image:title: Reed Accent Table

image:image.image:caption: The sinuous and magical nature of the serpent is a constant in literature through the ages. This cocktail table features an inset tempered glass top with a pear lacquer frame and cast brass Serpent.

image:image.image:title: French Farmstead Side chair

image:image.image:caption: A ladder back side chair, the arched bar back above a faux rush seat, on turned legs joined by stretchers. The original George III, Midlands.
image:image.image:title: The Georgian Cottage Dining Chair

image:image.image:title: Shandon Bar Cabinet

image:image.image:title: Victory Oak Ladderback Side chair

image:image.image:title: Cabell Upholstered Chair II

image:image.image:title: Delphine Armchair

image:image.image:caption: A ladder back armchair, the arched bar back above a woven faux rush seat, on turned legs joined by stretchers. The original George III, Midlands.
image:image.image:title: The Georgian Cottage Dining Armchair

image:image.image:caption: A rustic white painted dining chair, the arched ladder back above a 'floating' faux rush seat, on cabriole legs joined by turned stretchers. Inspired by a 19th century French original.
image:image.image:title: Delphine Side Chair

image:image.image:caption: An oak ladder back armchair, the bow arched bars between turned supports, above a hand woven faux rush seat, on turned legs with pad and ball feet. Inspired by an 18th century English original.
image:image.image:title: Victory Oak Ladderback Armchair

image:image.image:caption: Emily is a cocktail table with legs, a fresh modern updated on a classic Chinoiserie silhouette. The rectangular table top with beautiful pierced and wavy apron is set on inswept Chau legs.
image:image.image:title: Emily Chau Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Sometimes nightstand, accent table or end table, sleek-lined Regina works a room with modern finesse. Ample storage and display space with one open shelf and two drawers with jewelry-like Hampton Brass finish handles. Set on octagonal tapered feet.
image:image.image:title: Regina Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: Based on a canonical Chau-footed side table, Alexa Hampton brings the Far East home with a striking yet understated accent table. Timothy is a master class in quiet detail: molded-edge top, slightly recessed and pierced apron, lower tier with drawer, and square legs with Chinese inscrolled feet. Mahogany and Mahogany veneered.
image:image.image:title: Timothy Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Alexa Hampton’s clean and sleek reinvention of a classic coffee table, Baron holds court beautifully. Rectangular cocktail table top is bound in brass with a simple frieze. Set on octagonal legs clad in acanthus cast feet. Beech and mahogany veneers.
image:image.image:title: Baron Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Based on a French tric-trac table, Sargent is a winning writing table or gaming table. Reversible desktop panel sports a backgammon and chess/checker board with counter well. Chevron corners with two drawers at the paneled frieze. Tapering legs with brass moldings and cappings. Mahogany and Mahogany veneer.
image:image.image:title: Sargent Game Table

image:image.image:caption: Alexa Hampton brings new life to a classic console table with amazing attention to detail. The Bianco Carrara marble breakfront top is framed in Mahogany with Greek key decoration. The shape is reprised in the lower tiers. Eight turned legs with gilt banding bring it all together, beautifully.
image:image.image:title: Celia Console Table

image:image.image:caption: Alexa Hampton’s Scott Chest of Drawers radiates charm with ten starburst-relief carved drawers. Campaign drawer handles recall the design’s Anglo-Indian inspiration. Set on turned bun feet. Crafted in Mahogany and Mahogany veneers.
image:image.image:title: Scott Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: Oval Section with Shagreen Embossed Leather WrapTempest Finish with Brushed Brass Handles & Open BaseFive Bowfront Drawers
image:image.image:title: Payton Tall Chest

image:image.image:caption: With turned and tapering bobbin legs and peg feet, Oakley evokes a British West Indies colonial vibe. The rectangular reeded-edge coffee tabletop offers ample surface space, matched with a lower tier for storage and display. Ribbon Mahogany veneered top.
image:image.image:title: Oakley Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: The Lindsay console table quietly charms with strict lines, perfect symmetries and secrets. A plain frieze apron holds a hidden drawer. The table base is a network of turned and fluted column supports and pilasters with a mirrored back panel. Set on a concave plinth base.
image:image.image:title: Lindsay Console Table

image:image.image:caption: There’s a not-so-quiet dignity to the McCombs Dresser with three fretwork relief frieze drawers, and six generously sized paneled drawers with Hampton finish brass handles below. A chamfered-edge dresser top and turned tapered legs balance details from top to bottom.
image:image.image:title: McCombs Dresser

image:image.image:caption: Andrew puts a modern spin on the traditional buffet cabinet. There’s storage aplenty with four frieze drawers, two center doors opening to interior shelves, plus open storage on buffet sides. Doric pilasters flow into turned, tapered legs capped in brass.
image:image.image:title: Andrew Buffet

image:image.image:caption: Dexter is a modern solitaire inspired by a watch face. A round bevel-edge mirror plate is cast in a faceted octagonal frame. An understated yet striking decorative wall mirror from Alexa Hampton. Vintage Brass finish.
image:image.image:title: Dexter Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: The perfect petit dining room table or essential entryway table- the choice is yours. The round sunburst table top is figured in Mahogany veneer with a reeded edge outlined in Hampton brass. The down-swept monolithic table pedestal is supported by a Cavetto molded base detailed with brass nailheads.
image:image.image:title: Hailey Dining / Center Table

image:image.image:caption: Moderne meets Midcentury Modern in this singular sideboard buffet. Channeled paneled design conceived with four drawers and doors, detailed with oval Hampton brass finished handles. Sideboard top is ready to serve with a three-quarter gallery. Lobed reeded tapered legs with brass cappings.
image:image.image:title: Benedict Buffet

image:image.image:caption: Side table or sculpture? Ingrid is that rare design, a work of art and beautiful accent table. The base is a network of faux bamboo cast in brass with brass strappings. The table top is veneered with glass overlay. An eglomise tray top completes the design. Organic and sophisticated.
image:image.image:title: Ingrid Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Biedermeier-style integrity of form and function influence the Nico console table, as does the world of fashion. The distinctive frieze apron is decorated with square faceted appliques while concealing a useful drawer. Set on canted legs connected with a stretcher.
image:image.image:title: Nico Console Table

image:image.image:caption: This French neoclassical nightstand is based on an antique in Alexa Hampton’s own home. Cherished details abound: pierced brass gallery with Bianco Carrara marble top, pullout tray, single drawer with cast brass handles, tapered legs with brass capitals and feet, and pierced brass gallery lower shelf. Perfect as an end table too!
image:image.image:title: Matilde Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: Miguel is modern industrial chic. It’s all about the base, a studded steel monolith bound by bracket supports. Square cocktail tabletop is Mahogany veneered.
image:image.image:title: Miguel Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Boldly proportioned and conceived, the Cristina cocktail table’s square frame acts as an anchor. The perimeter and legs of the coffee table are set in a faux-bamboo frame. Brushed and textured veneered top.
image:image.image:title: Cristina Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Historically inspired, yet updated, the Cecil chest of drawers is perfect for the bedroom and beyond. Three frieze drawers sit atop three more long drawers with bold brass handles. Flanked by spiral turned columns and set on block feet.
image:image.image:title: Cecil Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: Every room needs an Evie, a classic two-tiered side table, perfect for an eclectic range of interiors. A glass shelf tops a marbleized églomisé lower shelf. Set in a brass frame with reeded edges, capped with faceted finials. The whole is balanced on graceful casters. A must-have living room table.
image:image.image:title: Evie Two Tiered Brass Side Table

image:image.image:caption: An antique Victorian bamboo side table inspires the lines of the May side table. Fashioned in faux bamboo carved Beech with gilt-tooled Caramel finish leather inlaid shelves. How wonderfully asymmetrical. The middle shelf cantilevers and seems to float. Set on splayed feet.
image:image.image:title: May Side Table

image:image.image:caption: This two-tier console table showcases Theodore Alexander’s amazing metalwork. Note the mirrored brass gallery top, stylish X-supports and reeded brass legs finished with acanthus-leaf cast feet. The lower shelf sports a beautiful blonde figured veneer with painted Greek-key border.
image:image.image:title: Emilia Console Table

image:image.image:caption: True to its French Moderne lineage, Gordon is a study in curves and angles. Two shapely filing drawers flank the kneehole. The desktop is ready to work with a two-drawer superstructure, and at the frieze, three drawers and two end slides. Set on splayed legs with brass cappings.
image:image.image:title: Gordon Pedestal Desk

image:image.image:caption: Based on a Biedermeier original, the two-door cabinet is detailed with a single frieze drawer, column capitals, ivory-finish escutcheons and set on raised block feet. William may also be used as a bar cabinet with a spacious interior and adjustable shelf.
image:image.image:title: William Bar Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: Harris is geometric, generously scaled and yet ethereal, a designer go-to accent table for most any interior. Glass inserts rest atop an open trellis fretwork, creating a wonderful play of light and shadow in three lovely tiers. Detailed with bead moldings, ring turned supports and set on peg feet.
image:image.image:title: Harris Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by a Danish antique, the four-tier Hunt étagère is rife with broader global influences. Like the molded pagoda cornice. Or the spiral column supports detailed with Classic carved capitals and set on lobed tapering legs. Four open shelves offer a world of storage and display space.
image:image.image:title: Hunt Étagère

image:image.image:caption: A great decorative mirror can add instant architecture to a room. The Jaipur Wall Mirror evokes Moorish architecture with an exotic sculpted arch surrounding the mirror plate.
image:image.image:title: Jaipur Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: An earlier prototype of this unusual cocktail table, inspired by Greco-Roman grave stelae, can be found in Alexa Hampton’s own apartment. The waterfall tabletop is trimmed in Brass, descending to end supports with pierced and gilt Moorish windows. Stepped plinth bases. Textured ribbon Mahogany.
image:image.image:title: Amalia Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by a favorite French antique buffet sideboard. Bianco Carrara marble top with sculpted corners. Fluted column uprights detailed with cotton-reel cast capitals. Door/drawer fronts adorned with cast brass handles and molding. Turned and fluted tapering legs with brass cappings. Mahogany solid and Crown veneer.
image:image.image:title: Hamilton Sideboard

image:image.image:caption: The Ellie wall mirror takes her timeless form from a pair of Chinese Chippendale mirrors purchased by Mark Hampton for his office. The rectangular mirror plate is set in a relief geometric fretwork. Paneled Mahogany veneered frame.
image:image.image:title: Ellie Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: An intoxicating bar cabinet! Mahogany parquet door fronts are overlaid with geometric brass diamond trim and Y handles. Set on square tapered legs with a brass X stretcher. Inside, Max fulfills his liquor cabinet mission: LED-lit with mirror back, glass hangers, galleried shelf, wine rack and two drawers.
image:image.image:title: Max Bar Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: An updated riff on a neoclassical pedestal table, the Sofia side table boasts a crossbanded top with inverted hand-gilt scalloped edge. The pedestal is equally amazing: a turned and tassel-carved column decorated with gilt and set on a trefoil concave base with raised peg feet.
image:image.image:title: Sofia Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Coco pays homage to Louis XVI and Jansen furniture. Revel in the gaming table detail: gilt-tooled leather top (chess or backgammon, anyone?), fluted frieze with cast brass flowerhead corner brackets and turned and fluted tapered legs with brass casters.
image:image.image:title: Coco Game Table

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by the 19th Century age of exploration, this reeded-edge drop-leaf console table doubles as a writing table. The top is set on turned, reeded and spiral-carved balusters with down-swept legs, terminating in brass cappings with castors. Detailed with two ivory-handled drawers.
image:image.image:title: Hardin Sofa Table

image:image.image:caption: Sebastiano combines a historic silhouette with an edgy modern sensibility. Rectangular dining table is curved with an apron bound in brass. Set on slatted baluster legs outlined in gilt. Company coming? It’s an extendable dining room table with three leaves.
image:image.image:title: Sebastiano Extending Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: This étagère is one for the books – or collectibles or artwork – and beyond brilliant as a room divider. A traditional molded cornice tops the open bookcase, followed by four tray gallery tiers secured with turned column supports.
image:image.image:title: Spencer Étagère

image:image.image:caption: Clubby and stylishly masculine, Alan cuts a dashing cocktail table profile. The molded-edge rectangular top is beautifully crafted in ribbon Mahogany veneer parquetry, and stands on bold column legs joined by a network of X stretchers. Set on turned disc feet.
image:image.image:title: Alan Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: An Austrian center table with neoclassical DNA caught inspired this extendable dining table. Striking sunburst Amara veneered top with Amara finish expands with six radial leaves. The pedestal is a series of four square reversed tapered legs joined by an X stretcher. Hampton brass finish feet.
image:image.image:title: Edward Extending Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: The modestly scaled Penelope accent table has strong architectural lines. This faceted end table is an ideal decorative gesture in most any design plan. Hexagon top and paneled base are inlaid with Caramel finish leather, trimmed in nailheads and set on a plinth base.
image:image.image:title: Penelope Accent Table

image:image.image:caption: A Biedermeier moment, architectural detailing shines in the seven-drawer Viggo chest of drawers fitted with brass handles (in our Hampton brass finish) and ivory-finish escutcheons. Beautiful stepped-caddy dresser top and bracket feet. Solid Cherry and veneers.
image:image.image:title: Viggo Tall Sémanier Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: The Blix side table is a colonial flavored piece with a nod to Anglo-Indian furniture flavors. A framework of spiral turned and tapered legs supports two frieze drawers below a reeded rectangular top. Two caned shelves for stylish storage and display.
image:image.image:title: Blix Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Three relief-shaped drawers, each with a trio of brass drop handles distinguish this chest of drawers. Modern, geometric and sculptural, Leif works a floor plan. Square tapered legs capped in brass. Chevron Mahogany veneered and crossbanded.
image:image.image:title: Leif Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: The Siena is inspired by travels through Italy. The extendable dining tabletop in Mahogany veneer is detailed with a Hampton Brass reeded edge. Two down-swept and tapered monolithic pedestals form the molded Cavetto base, decorated with brass nailhead trim – a final grace note. Expands with one leaf.
image:image.image:title: Siena Extending Dining Table

image:image.image:caption: The Denison bed is a nod to Anglo-Indian furniture. Note the modestly scrolled headboard and footboard with caned panels. Reeded rails, flowerhead carved roundels, scroll carvings and turned tapered legs add authenticity and charm.
image:image.image:title: Denison Sleigh US Queen Bed

image:image.image:caption: Très chic. This writing table is a twist on a French classic. Desktop boasts a gilt-tooled leather inset and frieze slides. Flowerhead fretwork wraps around the apron, outfitted with three drawers. The desk stands on turned and fluted tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Mirabella Writing Table

image:image.image:caption: The Vlad mirror is like a piece of abstract art – interesting and open to interpretation. Overall, the wall mirror is hexagon shaped. Strategically inserted geometric relief plates act as prisms, toying with shape and light. A sculptural and dimensioned mirror.
image:image.image:title: Vlad Hexagonal Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: Alexa Hampton designed Kate as a custom original for a beloved client’s NYC flat. Now, this simple rectangular cocktail table is available to all. The coffee tabletop is detailed with side slides along the apron. Set on sculpted tapered legs with brass casters. Solid Beech and Mahogany veneer.
image:image.image:title: Kate Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: This two-tier side table showcases Theodore Alexander’s amazing metalwork. Note the mirrored brass gallery top, stylish X-supports and reeded brass legs finished with acanthus-shaped cast feet. The lower shelf sports a beautiful blonde figured veneer with painted Greek-key border. The ultimate end table.
image:image.image:title: Emilia Side Table

image:image.image:caption: A small-scale design powerhouse, this accent table can anchor larger pieces or go solo in the center of a room. Beautifully scalloped with a single frieze drawer, serpentine tray top and lower shelf, the end table is set on square tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Addison Accent Table

image:image.image:caption: The Denison bed is a nod to Anglo-Indian furniture. Note the modestly scrolled headboard and footboard with caned panels. Reeded rails, flowerhead carved roundels, scroll carvings and turned tapered legs add authenticity and charm.
image:image.image:title: Denison Sleigh US King Bed

image:image.image:caption: Ian summons the bold geometries of Art Deco and a passion for architecture. Recessed frieze apron holds a rectangular molded-edge table top. The base is a three-part story: a trio of tapered columns stand tall on a stepped plinth base. And adaptable as a sofa table, too.
image:image.image:title: Ian Console Table

image:image.image:caption: A Biedermeier moment, architectural detailing shines in the six-drawer Viggo dresser fitted with brass handles (in Hampton brass finish) and ivory-finish escutcheons. Beautiful stepped-caddy dresser top and bracket feet. Solid Cherry and veneers.
image:image.image:title: Viggo Dresser

image:image.image:caption: The Denison bed is a nod to Anglo-Indian furniture. Note the modestly scrolled headboard and footboard with caned panels. Reeded rails, flowerhead carved roundels, scroll carvings and turned tapered legs add authenticity and charm.
image:image.image:title: Denison Sleigh California King Bed

image:image.image:caption: Boldly drawn breakfront-top sideboard beautifully serves form and function. Two central drawers and two relief-panel door compartments form the primary body of the sideboard buffet. Three baguette relief drawers with pullout trays offer extra storage space. Set on raised turned and tapered legs.
image:image.image:title: Oscar Sideboard

image:image.image:caption: Glamour radiates from the Ness wall mirror, a modern spin on the starburst mirror. The frame of the round mirror mimics the irregular rays of the sun with machine-age precision, and the steel frame is detailed with rivets. Hampton brass finish. Mirror center plate.
image:image.image:title: Ness Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: Sometimes an accent table is more like an exotic treasure. A series of Moorish recessed panels framed in Ebony with gilt details repeat on the end table’s hexagon base. The eggshell inlaid tabletop is perfect for a cocktail – or two. Set on a plinth base.
image:image.image:title: Catherine Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Philippe is a modern reimagining of a classic Regency-style wall mirror. The central antique mirror is set in a chevron-leaf carved frame, mitered with an interior frame. A glorious serpentine crest tops the wall mirror.
image:image.image:title: Philippe Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: The Bolen cocktail ottoman is a wonderful cultural mix with Anglo-Indian antecedents – and a go-to for today’s home. Channel-upholstered top is paired with a handy removable tray, and set in a reeded panel base. Finished with octagonal tapered legs with capitals and brass castors.
image:image.image:title: Bolen Cocktail Ottoman

image:image.image:caption: Better than a good book as a bedside mate, the Josef Nightstand offers open-shelf storage and a recessed frieze drawer with brass handles and an ivory-finished escutcheon. Architectural Doric columns with ebonized capitals and bases flank the sides. Set on raised block feet. Mahogany and Mahogany veneers.
image:image.image:title: Josef Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: Columnar and sculptural, the Hinton Center table is destined for center stage. Six turned legs with reeded baluster carvings rise from a six-point star plinth base set on molded feet. Completed with a round molded-edge tabletop. Mahogany solids and veneers.
image:image.image:title: Hinton Center Table

image:image.image:caption: Carmen showcases layers of interest. This beveled-edge antiqued mirror center is set in a frame of consecutive octagonal coffered mirrored plates. The optics are gorgeous in this decorative mirror. May be hung horizontally or vertically.
image:image.image:title: Carmen Rectangular Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: While Antonio’s DNA is all 1930’s Italian, this sleek modern game table translates perfectly in today’s homes. The gilt-tooled leather top is ready for play, with pivoting hinged drawers on the frieze. All supported on bold square legs and set on tapered brass cappings.
image:image.image:title: Antonio Game Table

image:image.image:caption: The Jacqueline side table evokes historical models with familiar flourishes: interlocking rings and tapered legs capped in brass. Jacqueline ups the ante with the addition of pyramid punctuation along the frieze apron, and a functional slide. Hand-brushed frieze details flesh out this rich design. Mahogany veneered.
image:image.image:title: Jacqueline Side Table

image:image.image:caption: Esme mesmerizes. Faceted like a jewel, the octagonal-shaped wall mirror is also set in a frame of octagons. Beveled-edge center mirror plate with coffered mirrored plates surround. A beautiful alternative to a more conventional round mirror.
image:image.image:title: Esme Octagonal Wall Mirror

image:image.image:caption: Inspired by a Russian antique, Olga is a jewel – and a nightstand. Crafted in Mahogany solids and veneers, Olga boasts three geometric paneled drawers and diamond-faceted side panels. The reeded base sits on square tapered legs. Molded-edge Bianco Carrara marble top.
image:image.image:title: Olga Nightstand

image:image.image:caption: What an amazing quartet. The Christophe side table is, in fact, a group of four movable trays with simulated Amara Veneered dished tops set on ebonized Chau bases. Stackable, they come together or go it alone. Perfect for highly polished rooms. Stunning in layered spaces with a bohemian edge. Designer’s call!
image:image.image:title: Christophe Tiered Side Table

image:image.image:caption: A figured anagre veneered King Bed, the rectangular headboard having a moulded frame and an interior etched brass frame with a LED lighting system to the top moulding, enclosing a shallow tufted and sewn panel pad, with a similar footboard.
image:image.image:title: London SW3 Bed (US King)

image:image.image:caption: An exceptional mahogany and parcel gilt four poster or 'Tester' bed, the spiral turned baluster columns surmounted by a acanthus leaf scroll canopy with a sunburst pleated silk insert, the tufted upholstered scroll over headboard above mahogany rails with acanthus carved cabriole legs.
image:image.image:title: Repose (US King) Bed

image:image.image:caption: A finely carved mahogany side chair, the shield back with carved rosette corners and a veneered frame, enclosing carved splats, the upholstered seat with a shaped rail on square tapering fluted legs with spade feet. Inspired by a George III original.
image:image.image:title: Palmerston's Dinner Side chair

image:image.image:caption: An exceptional mahogany and parcel gilt four poster or 'Tester' bed, the spiral turned baluster columns with ball finials and tufted upholstered scroll over headboard above mahogany rails with acanthus carved cabriole legs.
image:image.image:title: Repose II (US King) Bed

image:image.image:caption: Pitched Twin Layer Boxed BackBoxed Cushion SeatUpholstered DeckInset Rails on square Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Duke Slipper Chair

image:image.image:caption: An accent chair with personality, Stephanie charms with a pierced trellis back that narrows, in hourglass fashion, to brass-capped sabre legs. Down-swept arms embrace a tight upholstered seat. A wonderful geometry of form in Mahogany.
image:image.image:title: Stephanie Chair

image:image.image:caption: Hammered Steel Accent ChairTrapezoid Upholstered Horizontally Channeled BackChanneled Seat and Angled ArmsOn Textured Steel Geometric Legs
image:image.image:title: Bexley

image:image.image:caption: Sinuous and sculptural, the Lorenzo chaise longue is an invitation to pause. Be mindful of the detail: the lounging chaise is framed in wood, with right arm facing for lovely asymmetry. Loose cushion seat and back cushion promise comfort. Set on splayed tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Lorenzo Right Arm Facing Chaise

image:image.image:caption: Vittorio is a streamlined take on a classic Chesterfield sofa. Deep biscuit-tuft tailoring define arms, inside back and seat. The sofa arms and back are purposefully angular and over-scrolled to dramatic effect. Set on block feet.
image:image.image:title: Vittorio Sofa

image:image.image:caption: Pierre is silhouette forward accent chair with arched baluster splat back, perfectly tailored tight seat, and sabre legs with brass cappings. A comfy eye-candy accent chair in Mahogany.
image:image.image:title: Pierre Chair

image:image.image:caption: Dramatically Arched Serpentine Upholstered HeadboardBeech FramePadded Inset Rails with Dressmaker Skirt
image:image.image:title: Kyoto Bed

image:image.image:caption: The Josephine chair is a direct descendant of the French fauteuil, with no detail left to chance. The scrolled and tufted chair back are counterpoint to a tight boxed seat. Padded arms are detailed with turned and fluted wood supports, reprised in the chair’s shapely legs. Finished with brass cappings and castors.
image:image.image:title: Josephine Chair

image:image.image:caption: Semi Attached Boxed Cushion SeatUpholstered DeckInset Rails on square Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Duke Ottoman

image:image.image:caption: The decorative arts flourished during Napoleon III’s reign. Thus inspired, the Milly upholstered chair is the peak of chic today. Stylishly armless, the tight seat and back culminate with a built-in bolster back, pleated and buttoned at each side. Set on turned and tapering legs with brass cappings and castors.
image:image.image:title: Milly Chair

image:image.image:caption: C' Scroll Back and inscrolled Arm DetailsTight Concave Fronted Seat with Two Throw PillowsUpholstered Base
image:image.image:title: Maiden sofa

image:image.image:caption: Boxed-upholstered seat ottoman set on turned and fluted tapering legs with brass cappings and casters. Pairs brilliantly with an easy chair, but indispensable throughout the home, wherever extra seating is required or desired.
image:image.image:title: Josephine Ottoman

image:image.image:caption: Perfect in pairs, this armless chair is tête-à-tête ready. This slipper chair features a loose boxed-cushion seat. The tight seat back with picture-frame detailing delivers style. Upholstered seat deck is trimmed in nailheads. This low-slung chair is set on turned, fluted and gilt tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Louis Chair

image:image.image:caption: Arched Tight Upholstered Back with Downswept ArmsBoxed Loose Cushion SeatOn Inset Rounded Corner 'Clamp' Legs with Tapering Feet
image:image.image:title: Lafayette Chair

image:image.image:caption: Sinuous and sculptural, the Lorenzo chaise longue is an invitation to pause. Be mindful of the detail: the lounging chaise is framed in wood, with left arm facing for lovely asymmetry. Loose cushion seat and back cushion promise comfort. Set on splayed tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Lorenzo Chaise Longue

image:image.image:caption: Beech FrameBoxed Cushion Back and SeatAngular Arms and Turned Javelin LegsBrass Finish Tall Feet
image:image.image:title: Marietta Chair

image:image.image:caption: Upholstered SofaCurved Deep Buttoned BackDownswept Arms with Buttoned Inside ArmsTriple Loose Cushion Seat with Four Throw PillowsUpholstered Base
image:image.image:title: Debonair

image:image.image:caption: Fairbanks offers a new French twist on the classic four-poster bed. It’s a statement piece for the bedroom. Two carved posts topped with finials frame a tufted inset headboard with scalloped edges. The theme is reprised in an open-toe poster footboard. Set on turned and fluted feet.
image:image.image:title: Fairbanks Bed

image:image.image:caption: The Dauphine sofa is an imaginative riff on Maison Jansen style, with Louis XVI leitmotifs. Witness the tight upholstered back framed in nailhead, modestly scrolled arms securing a triple-cushion loose seat, perfectly placed nailhead trim along the sofa base, and spiral turned tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Dauphin sofa

image:image.image:caption: Tight Upholstered Back & Downswept ArmsBoxed Loose Cushion SeatRecessed Band to Outside ArmsRaised on Tapering Block Legs
image:image.image:title: Dyre Chair

image:image.image:caption: Scoop Back SofaTight Upholstered BackLoose Bench Cushion SeatUpholstered Base & Outside BackOn Square Tapering Block Feet
image:image.image:title: Evanston

image:image.image:caption: Juliet has found her destiny at the foot of the bed. Leaf and flowerhead capitals adorn the apron of the bench, finished with brass-capped reeded legs, and a deeply tufted and welted bench seat.
image:image.image:title: Juliet Bench

image:image.image:caption: Short Wing Upholstered Back with Loose Back CushionBoxed Loose Cushion Seat with Kidney PillowAngular Track ArmsOn Inset Corner 'Clamp' Details with Nail Head TrimOn Splayed Square Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Homer Chair

image:image.image:caption: Stanton may be the definitive upholstered bed. The scrolled headboard is generously padded with wood trim inlaid on each side. Upholstered foot and side rails are set on a Beech base with block feet.
image:image.image:title: Stanton Bed

image:image.image:caption: Tight Back & SeatAngular Wings Trailing to Outscrolled ArmsMahogany Outscrolled UprightsMahogany Seat rail & Splayed Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Atticus Armchair

image:image.image:caption: A classic form in modern upholstery, the Albert sofa can go anywhere and be anything, with your creative fabric selection. The plush bench cushion is held in place with locking apostrophe arms. Three loose boxed cushions form the back, with two throw pillows flanking the high tuxedo-arms. Set on raised block feet.
image:image.image:title: Albert Extended Sofa

image:image.image:caption: Short Wing Upholstered Back with Triple Loose Back CushionsBoxed Triple Loose Cushion Seat with Three Kidney PillowsTwo Further Throw PillowsAngular Track ArmsOn Inset Corner 'Clamp' Details with Nail Head TrimOn Splayed Square Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Bowery sofa

image:image.image:caption: The Salz accent chair strikes a pose. The tight back is gently arched in iconic camelback style, with sloped scrolled arms. Salz is detailed with wood trim and stands on square tapered legs capped in brass.
image:image.image:title: Salz Chair

image:image.image:caption: A classic form in modern upholstery, the Albert sofa can go anywhere and be anything, with your creative fabric selection. The plush bench cushion is held in place with locking apostrophe arms. Three loose boxed cushions form the back, with two throw pillows flanking the high tuxedo-arms. Set on raised block feet.
image:image.image:title: Albert Sofa

image:image.image:caption: Tight Upholstered Back with Nail Trim Framing DetailsScroll Arms enclosing a Triple Loose Cushion SeatNail Trim Detailed Upholstered Base on Spiral Turned Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Dauphin Extended Sofa

image:image.image:caption: An undeniably plum position for the master bedroom. This iconic Alhambra arch padded headboard outlined in nailhead trim borrows freely and reverently from Mughal architecture. Fully upholstered peninsula bed, with expertly upholstered rails, is set on tapered block feet.
image:image.image:title: Plum Bed

image:image.image:caption: The Markham sofa is a happy hybrid of a French antique and classic Tuxedo-style divan. High track arms and back hold a bench cushion and three knife-edge loose cushion backs. Finished with two bolsters and two throw pillows. Set on spiral turned and tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Markham sofa

image:image.image:caption: Swivel ArmchairTight Upholstered Scoop BackLoose Cushion SeatUpholstered Base & Outside Back
image:image.image:title: Primrose

image:image.image:caption: A faithful reproduction of custom design from Alexa Hampton’s own home. Unique twin pi-shaped base, with buckle and nailhead trim detailing, offers infinite decorating possibilities in any floor plan, but you’ll spot HP Bench in service as a fireplace fender in the designer’s NYC flat.
image:image.image:title: HP Bench

image:image.image:caption: The Waldorf sectional offers a world of possibilities in five configurable pieces. You’re invited to mix and meld. The vibe is modern and lush, with track-arm styling and loose cushion back and seat construction in a tight banded base. Set on turned and tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Waldorf Sectional

image:image.image:caption: Thomas is a striking buttoned-up tub chair with a design legacy reaching back to Art Deco drawing rooms. The high back, arms, uprights and base are trimmed in Mahogany. The tufted chair interior, paired with loose-cushion seat, is enveloping.
image:image.image:title: Thomas Chair

image:image.image:caption: Mario is a perfectly pitched chair. Dramatically over-scrolled back and tight seat support lounging. Wood uprights along the curve of the back and arms add style and flair. Beautifully tailored and set on turned and reeded tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Mario Chair

image:image.image:caption: Oak Accent ChairElongated Hexagonal Padded BackSlatted Inswept Curved ArmsTight Upholstered Seat on Splayed Legs
image:image.image:title: Cantwell

image:image.image:caption: Tub ChairCurved Tight Upholstered BackLoose Cushion Seat with Kidney PillowThree Bold Upholstered Slab Legs'Cut Out' Base with Oak Detailed Feet
image:image.image:title: Admiral

image:image.image:caption: With equal parts Scandinavian and midcentury modern inspiration, Carl is totally today. The sofa configuration ensures comfort with three seat cushions, three back cushions and four throw pillows. A shapely Mahogany frame reveals all: down-swept arms, angular uprights and seat rail. Set on turned and tapered legs.
image:image.image:title: Carl sofa

image:image.image:caption: A sumptuous sofa with exotic Ottoman empire influences ticks all the luxury boxes. Canted knoll arms flank a bench cushion and back with four throw pillows. Perfectly tailored with a welt trim crest, underscoring the sofa’s beautiful lines. In place of a skirt, a long tassel fringe circles the sofa base.
image:image.image:title: Ergisi Sofa

image:image.image:caption: Triple Loose Button Detailed Boxed Cushion BacksBoxed and Button Tufted Bench Cushion Seat with Two Throw PillowsRecessed Track ArmsWooden Base rail with Angled Block Legs
image:image.image:title: Broadway sofa

image:image.image:caption: Decidedly neoclassical in inspiration – with a continental flair – the Maria chair pairs brilliantly with a wide variety of upholstery styles, because of its timelessness. The chair is framed in wood, with a notable serpentine seat rail. The oval back is curved for comfort. Set on paneled square tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Maria Chair

image:image.image:caption: Upholstered SofaElongated Tufted Arched Back and Outscrolled ArmsTwin Loose Cushion SeatSquare Tapering Legs
image:image.image:title: Dewsbury

image:image.image:caption: Swoon. The languorous Carter chaise long’s sexy silhouette is Regency-period inspired and set in a solid Beech frame with splayed tapering legs. The high right arm swoops to the loose cushion tucked into the frame. The ultimate chaise lounge.
image:image.image:title: Carter Chaise Longue

image:image.image:caption: Shapely Regency-styled accent chair adds a flash of dash and panache to a room. The over-scrolled back and seat are one – a single sinuous line. The turned and stacked roundel accents at the top and base of the seat are added grace notes of Regency flair. Set on molded sabre legs with brass cappings and castors.
image:image.image:title: Regent Chair

image:image.image:caption: Upholstered SofaPicture Frame upholstered Back with Tufted PanelNail Head Trim DecorationPadded Arms with Downswept Beech UprightsTriple Loose Cushion Seat with Two Throw PillowsSquare Tapering Legs with Molding Detail
image:image.image:title: Faulkner Tufted Sofa

image:image.image:caption: Upholstered ArmchairPicture Frame upholstered Back with Tufted PanelNail Head Trim DecorationPadded Arms with Downswept Beech UprightsLoose T Cushion SeatSquare Tapering Legs with Molding Detail
image:image.image:title: Faulkner Tufted Chair

image:image.image:caption: Upholstered SofaPicture Frame upholstered Back with Tufted PanelNail Head Trim DecorationPadded Arms with Downswept Beech UprightsTwin Loose Cushion Seat with Two Throw PillowsSquare Tapering Legs with Molding Detail
image:image.image:title: Faulkner Tufted Apartment Sofa

image:image.image:caption: A finely hand-painted and black lacquered cabinet on stand, the cabinet with gold leaf and hand-painted decoration of peacocks in a landscape, with fine repousse chased brass mounts, on a base with chamfered legs and fretwork spandrels hand-painted in floral and lattice decoration. The LED lit interior fitted as a bar with a mirror back and adjustable glass shelf.
image:image.image:title: Peacock Cabinet

image:image.image:caption: A finely detailed flame mahogany, Morado banded and Movingue strung cocktail table, the oval top with a reeded edge, above finely cast brass palm leaf capital cluster legs joined by an undertier.
image:image.image:title: Palm Room Oval Cocktail Table

image:image.image:caption: A fine had carved Le Brun finish spoon back dining armchair, the oval upholstered back flanked by scrolled padded arms, above an upholstered seat with a carved seat rail, on turned and fluted tapering legs.
image:image.image:title: Ismay Dining Armchair

image:image.image:caption: A fine Cupid's bow crested mahogany side chair, the upholstered back and seat with a cupid's bow seat rail with nail head decoration, on scroll hand carved mahogany cabriole legs joined by stretchers.
image:image.image:title: Cupid's Bow Dining Side Chair

image:image.image:caption: Rectangular Walnut Grained Veneer TopSubtle Modern ParquetryMacadamia FinishDark Macadamia Finish Angled Base

image:image.image:caption: An Oxford finish mahogany and quartered Etimoe hand-veneered framed and upholstered Bed, the serpentine arched headboard with trailing vine mounts to the crest and corners, with upholstered and molded rails and a footboard, on acanthus leaf carved cabriole legs.
image:image.image:title: Eulalie California King Bed

image:image.image:caption: An Oxford finish swirl walnut and mahogany banded tall chest of drawers or Sémanier with Primavera and ebonized stringing details, the serpentine molded edge top above six graduated drawers with fine brass handles, above a shaped apron on carved cabriole legs.
image:image.image:title: Neville Tallboy Chest of Drawers

image:image.image:caption: ParquetryRustic Oak Sunburst Parquetry Centre BackLight Echo Oak FinishChevron Parquetry Secondary SplatsDownswept ArmsUpholstered Seat with Square Tapering Legs
